Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 16 Micchattaniyatattika » 16.1 Paṭiccavāra » 16.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 16.1.2.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Micchattaniyatattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
11.
2281Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
2282Paccanīyaṃ.
<< 16.1.2.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup16.1.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya >>
